title: "New hate speech laws 'give priority over what can be said' about protected groups"
excerpt: "New hate speech laws will give 'priority over what can and can't be said' about protected groups. That's according to one interest group, which is protesting against the upcoming legislation. The Criminal Justice (Incitement to Violence or Hatred and Hate Offences) Bill is currently in the Seanad."
